page.title: 18FARM LIFE
page.content: THE FARMER TODAY BEARS NO RECEMBLANCE TO HIS COUNTERPART OF FIFTY YEARS AGO.NOT ONLY DOES HE NEED TO KNOW ALL ABOUT THE CARE OF HIS ANIMALS,THE BREEDING AND REARING OF THE YOUNG,THE MILKING,THE SILAGE MAKING AND THE HAY MAKING.HE ALSO NEEDS TO BE A MECHANIC,A HEALTH AND SAFETY EXPERT,A CHEMIST,AN ACCOUNTANT AND A PERSON WHO CAN DEAL WITH THE VARIOUS INSPECTERS WHO MIGHT CALL. THE SMALL FARMER,WITH MAYBE 50 ACRES OF LAND IS RAPIDLY DISAPEARING TO BE REPLACED BY THE BIG FARMER. THE FARMERS WIFE MAY OCCASIONALLY HAVE TIME TO TURN THE SULPHUS MILK INTO CREAM OR INTO CHEESE BUT THIS IS FOR HOME USE AND NOT FOR SALE.SHE NEEDS TO LOOK AFTER THE HOME AND FAMILY AS EVER BUT ALSO HAS TO DRIVE THE CHILDREN TO CHOOL,DRIVE TO TOWN TO SHOP AND TO ASSIST WITH THE MANY OFFICAL FORMS.
